appList.title: ESPN
appList.description:
App Description: The ESPN App is the #1 Sports App in the market. The app gives you up-to-the-minute scores and the latest news, live video and audio streaming across ESPN’s networks, and loads of video highlights. Sign in and personalize the ESPN App to get alerts about scores and news from all of your favorite teams and leagues! No matter where you go, take ESPN with you to stay connected the moment you need it, from wherever you are.

What do you get with ESPN?

- Fast access to scores from the MLB, NFL, College Football, NBA, NHL, College Basketball, MLS, and more.
- Stories and videos from your favorite teams and leagues up front and center in your favorites feed. Simply pick your favorite leagues and teams to get started.
- Not near a TV or want to stream a second game? You now have one tap access to stream live events, up-to-the-minute news on Sportscenter, highlights and analysis from the ESPN family of networks.
- Take your sports wherever your ears go! Stream live ESPN Radio, over 100 other ESPN podcasts , live play-by-play and more — just tap on the headphones to listen.

ESPN, ESPN2, ESPN3, ESPNU, SEC Network, SEC Network Plus, ESPNews ESPN Deportes and Longhorn Network are now available for live streaming through WatchESPN in the ESPN App. Access to WatchESPN live video is determined by your TV provider and package and, in some instances, your Internet service provider. The providers below currently offer access to WatchESPN live video:

* AT&T U-verse
* Bright House Networks
* Charter
* Comcast XFINITY
* Cox
* DirecTV
* DISH
* Google Fiber
* Midcontinent Communications
* Optimum
* Time Warner Cable
* Verizon FiOS TV
* Plus many more providers

–-

Feedback:

- Follow us on Twitter for the latest updates and to provide feedback on the app: twitter.com/ESPN_FanCentral
- Use the Feedback form in the app’s Settings menu to let us know how we’re doing.

Terms of Use:
http://disneytermsofuse.com/

Privacy Policy:
https://disneyprivacycenter.com/

–-

Before you download this app, please consider that it includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within mobile applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device’s advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. You may also visit Settings in the app to opt out of Nielsen measurement.
appList.short_desc: ESPN - Get scores, news, and watch live sports

appList.title: NBA 2015-16
appList.description:
Follow the 2015-16 NBA Playoffs with the all new NBA app. The award-winning official FREE app of the NBA! 
- Instantly check live scores and Playoffs leaders 
- Get the latest Playoffs schedules and bracket 
- Customize your experience with your favorite team 
- Watch Playoffs game recap and highlights 
- Set customized alerts: Excitement alerts for big moments, Threshold alerts as players break personal records and Game Alerts so you never miss a moment 
You can also access full games with a NBA LEAGUE PASS subscription. Blackout restrictions may apply, depending on your location. 
- Watch on-demand regular-season games 
- Choose your broadcast – home or away
- Watch on your favorite devices including iPhone, iPad, iPod or Apple TV
- Watch NBA history with Classic NBA Games in season long subscriptions
- Purchase NBA LEAGUE PASS AUDIO to listen live to all of the Playoff games


What's NEW!
- NEW! Playoffs Series Hub w/ Player & Team Leaders to see who’s stepping up for the Playoffs
- NEW! Playoffs Social feature to keep up to date on who's trending
- NEW! Playoffs Bracket to show the big picture
appList.short_desc: The award-winning official FREE app of the NBA!
appList.what_is_new:
NEW! Playoffs Series Hub w/ Player & Team Leaders to see who’s stepping up for the Playoffs
NEW! Playoffs Social feature to keep up to date on who's trending
NEW! Playoffs Bracket to show the big picture

appList.title: FishBrain - Fishing App
appList.description:
Join 1.5M anglers in the world's largest social network of fishing enthusiasts! FishBrain fishing app is all about anglers contributing and benefiting from the community, so get involved today! FishBrain features
• Use the fishing forecast to catch more and bigger fish - based on real catch data
• Tap into the news feed to see what’s been caught in your area
• Explore new fishing locations in a simple way
• Check exact catch position shared by fellow anglers
• Log your catches while simultaneously contributing the world's largest database of catches 
• See statistics on thousands of fish species and baits
• Follow your friends fishing and access a vast community of anglers via the #1 fishing app

You can choose to share catch positions and fishing locations with the community or keep your secret spots to yourself.

All of this is available in the #1 fishing app for fishing enthusiasts!
appList.short_desc: Catch more and bigger fish with the greatest social fishing app on earth!
appList.what_is_new:
Thanks for using Fishbrain! To make the experience better for you, we continuously update the app with improvements for speed and reliability.
If you encounter any issues or require further assistance, please contact support at support@fishbrain.com

appList.title: WatchESPN
appList.description:
The free WatchESPN app lets you keep up with your sports anytime, anywhere on your Android phone and tablet. Watch live games and studio shows with 24/7 access to ESPN, ESPN2, ESPN3, ESPNU, SEC Network, SEC Network Plus, ESPNews, ESPN Deportes and Longhorn Network. You can also watch on-demand clips of the latest news and highlights. Access to live streaming video from ESPN, ESPN2, ESPN3, ESPNU, SEC Network, SEC Network Plus, ESPNews, ESPN Deportes and Longhorn Network is determined by your TV provider. The providers below offer access to WatchESPN live video:
- AT&T U-verse
- Bright House Networks
- Charter
- Comcast XFINITY
- Cox
- DirecTV
- DISH
- Google Fiber
- Midcontinent Communications
- Optimum
- Time Warner Cable
- Verizon FiOS TV

Please check back regularly as new TV providers are added. Access to on-demand highlights and news is available to everyone regardless of provider.

The WatchESPN app offers live streaming access to thousands of games and events on the ESPN networks, including:
- NFL Monday Night Football (tablet only)
- NBA Regular Season and Playoffs
- Major League Baseball
- The Masters and The Open Championship
- College Football and the College Football Playoff
- Men’s and Women’s College Basketball
- Grand Slam Tennis Events

Get up-to-the-minute news, highlights and analysis with live streaming of your favorite ESPN shows, including:
- SportsCenter
- First Take
- PTI
- College GameDay
- Mike & Mike
- SportsNation
- Baseball Tonight

--

Before you download this app, please consider that it includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within mobile applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device’s advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads).

--

Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information. You may also visit Settings in the app to opt out of Nielsen measurement.
appList.short_desc: Stay connected to live sports and shows from ESPN

appList.title: MLB.com At Bat
appList.description:
MLB.com At Bat – the #1 source for live baseball – Is the official app of Major League Baseball. *NEW FOR AT BAT IN 2016*
- It’s time - welcome to the 2016 Major League Baseball regular season 
- Introducing 60fps video for unmatched high quality streaming of select live MLB.TV broadcasts and highlight clips (available on select tablets only, At Bat Premium subscription required)
- App design improvements supporting Material Design
- Redesigned the Video index
- New notification for Cut4’s offbeat short-form content 
- New UI experience for League & Team News readers
- General improvements

****AT BAT SUBSCRIBPTIONS****
At Bat offers two subscription options for its extensive premium features, covering live MLB games from Opening Day to the World Series.
- Yearly recurring fee of $19.99.
- Monthly recurring fee of $2.99.
- MLB.TV Premium subscribers receive At Bat premium features for free.

***At Bat Features****
- Watch the MLB.TV Game of the Day or access your MLB.TV Premium subscription to watch every out-of-market game (Subscription Required)
- See key plays from every game with Live Look-Ins (No blackout restrictions)
- Access to every decisive replay review video clip & explanation via Gameday (At Bat Premium subscription required)
- Listen to Home, Away & Spanish-language (where available) radio broadcasts (At Bat Premium subscription required)
- Watch 60fps video for unmatched high quality streaming of select live MLB.TV broadcasts & highlight clips (iPhone 6+, select iPads only; At Bat Premium subscription required)
- Multi-platform live audio access for At Bat Premium subscribers (portable to Mac/PC with a valid MLB.com account)
- Universal support for At Bat Premium subscribers, accessible on Android smartphones & tablets and other supported mobile devices
- Enhanced, Gameday pitch-by-pitch features, including realistic ballpark renderings from all 30 MLB parks (At Bat Premium subscription required)
- Condensed Games (At Bat Premium subscription required)
- Customize At Bat's home screen to feature your designated favorite team(s).
- Favorite team icon home screen widget for one-click access to your favorite team’s At Bat homepage (Phones only)
- MLB icon home screen widget for in-progress scores around the league
- Video library archive, searchable by player, team or keyword (Phones only)
- Sortable batting, pitching & fielding statistics
- Breaking news, schedules & interactive rosters and players stats for every team
- Closed captioning for live video
- Watch MLB Network programming (pay TV authentication required)
- Application available in Spanish language, requires device language set to Spanish (Phone & Tablet)

Live action from the Arizona Diamondbacks, Atlanta Braves, Baltimore Orioles, Boston Red Sox, Chicago Cubs, Chicago White Sox, Cincinnati Reds, Cleveland Indians, Colorado Rockies, Detroit Tigers, Houston Astros, Kansas City Royals, Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim, Los Angeles Dodgers, Miami Marlins, Milwaukee Brewers, Minnesota Twins, New York Mets, New York Yankees, Oakland Athletics, Philadelphia Phillies, Pittsburgh Pirates, St. Louis Cardinals, San Diego Padres, San Francisco Giants, Seattle Mariners, Tampa Bay Rays, Texas Rangers, Toronto Blue Jays and Washington Nationals.

Access At Bat Premium for $2.99 per month or $19.99 annually. You will be automatically billed $2.99 through Google Play every 30 days or $19.99 every 365 days until you cancel your subscription. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You subscription can be managed and the auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the Google Play Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

© 2016 MLB Advanced Media, L.P. All Major League Baseball trademarks and copyrights used herein are the property of the applicable MLB entity. All rights reserved.
appList.short_desc: MLB.com At Bat – the #1 source for live baseball – Is the official app of MLB.

appList.title: FOX Sports GO
appList.description:
With FOX Sports GO, you can watch live sports and great shows from FOX Sports. Depending on your TV Provider, FOX Sports, FS1, FS2, your regional FOX Sports Network, FOX Soccer Plus, FOX College Sports and FOX Deportes may be available.* No matter where you go, take FOX Sports with you on your Android phone or tablet. FOX Sports GO features live coverage of great sports, including:
• NFL (web and tablet only)**
• MLB
• NBA
• NASCAR
• UFC
• College Football and College Hoops
• UEFA Champions League & Bundesliga Soccer

DUE TO LEAGUE RESTRICTIONS, NFL GAMES ARE NOT AVAILABLE IN FOX SPORTS GO ON PHONES.

You can also stream great shows like FOX Sports Live, The Ultimate Fighter, NASCAR Race Hub and UFC Tonight.

FOX Sports GO is free to download. All you need to do to watch is sign in with your TV Provider credentials.

FOX Sports GO—put FOX Sports in your pocket and GO.



*You need to receive these channels in your TV channel line-up to watch them in FOX Sports GO. Some channels may not yet be available for every TV Provider.

**Due to league restrictions, NFL games are not available in FOX Sports GO on phones.

***We may work with mobile advertising companies and other similar entities that help deliver advertisements tailored to your interests. For more information about such advertising practices and to opt-out, see www.aboutads.infl/choices. You may also download the App Choices app at www.aboutads.info/appchoices.

Support URL - http://www.foxsports.com/feedback?urlSubject=mobile
Marketing URL - http://www.foxsports.com/mobile
EULA URL - http://www.foxsports.com/end-user-license-agreement?nav=false
Terms of Use URL - http://www.foxsports.com/terms-of-use?nav=false
appList.short_desc: Watch live sports from FOX Sports, including NFL, NCAA Football, MLB, and UFC.
appList.what_is_new:
• Improved video quality
• Enhanced discovery with recommended content and Search
• Personalized favorite teams and sports
• Great new design
• Improved stability and performance

appList.title: Gametime - Buy Event Tickets
appList.description:
MOBILE TICKETS 
Gametime turns your phone into a ticket to your favorite sporting events and concerts in over 45 cities in the US and Canada!! Gametime makes buying the perfect seats easy, affordable and fast. GAMETIME GUARANTEE
After purchase, tickets are delivered directly to your phone so you never need a printer. Your tickets can be shared via email or SMS to anyone in your group, and they are 100% protected by our Gametime Guarantee.

SELL YOUR TICKETS

Already have tickets, but can’t make it? Don’t worry, we've got you covered. Sell your Gametime tickets with the push of a single button. After you buy, press the sell icon under "My Tickets" to try it out.

EPIC SEAT VIEWS
Each listing includes an epic panoramic view from your seat’s section so you know what to expect at the game.

CURATED LISTINGS
Since we're team-focused, there's no searching or sifting through events. We examine thousands of potential tickets and present you with only the best values - not an impossibly long list of options.

With Gametime, getting into the game is almost as amazing as being there!

appList.short_desc: Gametime = last minute sports and concert tickets in over 45 US markets.
appList.what_is_new:
A redesigned ticket detail page makes it easier to see your seats, change the number of tickets you want, and checkout fast.
Gametime also supports Android Pay, making the fastest checkout to fankind even faster. If you have Android Pay set up on your phone, it will automatically show up as a payment option.

appList.title: NBC Sports Live Extra
appList.description:
With NBC Sports Live Extra you can watch all of your favorite sports content on the go through your Android phone or tablet. Access to over 3,000 NBC Sports, NBCSN, Golf Channel and Comcast Sports Network events, video on demand, including highlights and full event replays, all accessible 24/7 with your cable, satellite, or Telco provider log-in credentials at no extra charge. 
Features: 
* Video on Demand: access video clips, preview upcoming events, and check out highlights from past events 
* Online coverage schedule: browse the online schedule and set event reminders 
* Live Events: watch marquee NBC Sports events LIVE! 
* Full Event Replays: relive all the great moments with full event replays 
* Push Notifications: receive reminder alerts for upcoming events 

Watch thousands of sporting events that air on NBC, NBCSN and Golf Channel LIVE with NBC Sports Live Extra. Download now on your Android handheld or tablet device and stream NHL Regular-Season and Stanley Cup Playoffs, PGA Tour, Notre Dame Football, French Open (tennis), Premier League (soccer), Formula One, NASCAR, Triple Crown horse racing and more.

The vast majority of live streaming content on NBC Sports Live Extra will only be available to authenticated cable, satellite and telco customers via TV Everywhere. Further instructions are provided in the app settings section. 

NBC Sports video is only accessible in the U.S. and certain U.S. territories. The application requires a 3G, 4G or WiFi data connection. Watching video over a 3G or 4G connection may affect your wireless data plan.
appList.short_desc: With NBC Sports Live Extra watch all your favorite sports content on the go!
appList.what_is_new:
- Customized filtering for your favorite leagues and teams.
- In Asset Alerts to get updates on all the action so you never miss a moment
- Easy discovery of the sports and events you love with a new featured content page and video play listing
- Crash fixes

appList.title: Bleacher Report: Team Stream
appList.description:
Stay ahead of the game with the latest news, scores, and highlights for the teams you love. Get alerts instantly, as stories break. Stay in the know about the latest rumors, news, and predictions across all the leagues you follow. Be a fantasy champion with all of the latest updates and stats for the players on your fantasy team. 

Download the app now, pick your favorite teams, and quickly get personalized and curated news about the things you care about. Have a customized sports experience, and never miss another big news story. What you get with Team Stream by Bleacher Report:

☆ Instant access to news, scores, schedules, and standings across all of the major leagues, including the NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAA football and basketball, MLS, UFC, WWE, Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Bundesliga and more.

☆ Compete in B/R's Interactive March Madness bracket for a chance to win 4 epic sports trips

☆ Articles and video highlights personalized for the teams, players and leagues you love

☆ Rankings, predictions and stats, all on the go. 

☆ The fastest notifications of any sports app, the instant something important happens

☆ Open a stream anytime for curated info from local newspapers, websites, blogs, Twitter, and Instagram

☆ Sync your fantasy account and get the latest stats and info about your players


Want an enhanced experience on your favorite social accounts too?

Follow Bleacher Report on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Snapchat to get the latest updates directly in your social account.


Want to get early access to new features? Sign up to test early versions here -> teamstre.am/TestTeamStream


Download Team Stream now. 


--

Please note, you will be asked for the following permissions after you download the app:

"Location" – to suggest local teams and stories

"Photos/Media/Files" and "Storage" – to support streaming video, we need to be able to edit media/files in your storage.

--

Terms of Use: http://bleacherreport.com/pages/terms

Privacy Policy: http://bleacherreport.com/pages/privacy
appList.short_desc: The best sports news, scores, alerts, & highlights for your favorite teams
appList.what_is_new:
New Permission Requests:
"Photos/Media/Files" – needed for streaming video
Version 4.3-4.3.4
★ Twitter videos and GIFs play in streams (for maximum crying Jordan meme)
★ Live Team Stats/Player Stats tabs for NBA
★ Cut bugs from the team like they posted bro convos on the internets #shade (including article loading issues affecting some Samsung users)
Feedback? Email teamstream+android@bleacherreport.com
Want to be a tester? Sign up here: http://teamstre.am/TestTeamStream

appList.title: KicksOnFire Air Jordans & Nike
appList.description:
- Most downloaded Sneaker Release Calendar app on Google Play. 
- Accurate up to date Release Dates & Sneaker News. 
- Shop & discover the largest Sneaker Marketplace via Kixify. 
- Profiles with personalized releases & price estimates. 
- Set reminders, win Free Kicks & Social Share! The heart and soul of the sneaker community, KicksOnFire.com is the top authority for sneaker culture, news and history.

Our mission is to provide an accessible information platform for the sneaker community and tools to facilitate the shopping experience for any footwear consumer.

Whether you're looking for a release date, price or the sneaker itself, we're here to help! We cover most brands such as Adidas, Air Jordan, New Balance, Nike, Puma, Reebok, Supra, Under Armour, Vans and more.

Download Now and be part of the global sneaker community!
appList.short_desc: #1 Sneaker news, release dates (Jordans & Nike), and sneaker culture app.
appList.what_is_new:
- New & improved iOS Design w/ personalized features.
- Shop & discover the largest Sneaker Marketplace via Kixify.
- Full screen mode for better user experience.
- Performance enhancements.
